TextView.android:text: 1.Word Ending -tion The word ending -tion (and sometimes spelled -sion, -cian, or -shion) is represented by ish.
2. Word Endings -cient, -clency The ending -cient (or -tient) is represented by ish t, while -ciency is represented by ish s e.
3. T for To in Phrases In phrases, to is represented by t when it comes before a downstroke.
